topics.body:
"@candycats":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55973683636872217b000315#post_55973683636872217b000315

Step 1: Open a new tab on the phone browser.
Step 2: Google Jontron gif
Step 3: Open the image and let it load
Step 4: Select the address bar/URL and an icon for copying it should appear, press it.
Step 5: Return to the previous tab where you want to paste it and introduce the address between exclamation marks.

Fair warning kitty, depending on the phone some GIFS might be too heavy and make the phone to crash which means you'll have to restart it (Keep the on/off button pressed for that) so watch out for that.

"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5597380a6368727e8e002845#post_5597380a6368727e8e002845
I backed up into a broken Mirror like on Full force. 

Funny thing is I didn't even notice until I fell over and couldn't get up. It tickled!

My mom was like "OH MY GOD YOUR HEAL IS SPLIT OPEN!"

And I'm like "Oh well that explains why I cant get up"

Note I was like 6 or 7 at the time I think?
